"Two Birds with One Stone":
"Hey, <%me>. You can explore
the White Summit now, can't you? Okay, then,
why don't you join me on a little mission there?
All the requests I've been getting lately have
been a major pain in the butt, so I was hoping
that a little company might help mix it up a little.

*Go with Zeno only and complete the
mission with an S Rank."

"よっ、<%me>。
凍土エリアにも行けるようになったんだろ？
よーし、それじゃあちょっと
俺と一緒に行ってみようぜ。
めんどくさい依頼ばっか入っててな。
ちょうど息抜きというか、気分転換を
したかったところなんだよな。

※ゼノのみ同行、Ｓランククリア"
